Listens to specific key for when it is held. Defaults to sprint if we can't find your specified key.
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapKey.name: Swap Hotbar Dedicated Key
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapKey.desc: Key to hold down and scroll to swap hotbars. Uses the listen key if not set.
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapSlotListen: Listens to specific key for when it is held. Defaults to sneak if we can't find your specified key.
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapSlot.name: Swap Hotbar Slot Dedicated Key
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapSlot.desc: Key to hold down and scroll to swap hotbar slot. Uses the listen key if not set.
config.hotbarswapper.prop.requireSwapKey: Require Swap Hotbar Key Held To Swap Slot
Do you need to hold the hotbar swap key to be able to swap a slot?
config.hotbarswapper.prop.ignoreEmptySlo: When selecting a row/slot to swap, ignore the empty ones?
config.hotbarswapper.prop.ignoredSlots.d:
These slots are ignored when changing rows/slots (slots are counted 0, 1, 2...8)

Add/remove a slot by holding the swap slot key then hitting the swap row key
config.hotbarswapper.prop.invertScrollDi: Scroll rows in the reverse order?
config.hotbarswapper.prop.itemScale.name: Item Scale
config.hotbarswapper.prop.itemScale.desc: The scale for the item when rendering a possible swap
config.hotbarswapper.prop.itemOffsetX.de: Horizontal offset when rendering the item
config.hotbarswapper.prop.itemOffsetY.de: Vertical offset when rendering the item
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapRowNext.de: Convenience key bind to swap row with next slot.
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapRowPrev.de: Convenience key bind to swap row with previous slot.
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapSlotNext.n: Swap Hotbar Slot With Next Row
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapSlotNext.d: Convenience key bind to swap slot with next slot.
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapSlotPrev.n: Swap Hotbar Slot With Previous Row
config.hotbarswapper.prop.swapSlotPrev.d: Convenience key bind to swap slot with previous slot.
config.hotbarswapper.prop.ignoreSlot.des: Convenience key bind to ignore or allow a slot.
key.hotbarswapper.swapSlotNext: Swap Hotbar Slot With Next Row
key.hotbarswapper.swapSlotPrev: Swap Hotbar Slot With Previous Row
